name: 湯銘文
objective: 本課程內容包含：基本通風理論，金屬/非金屬礦及煤礦通風，自然發火，溫度及濕度控制，煤層瓦斯及煙塵控制。
schedule:
Week 1	Introduction
Week 2	Properties and Behavior of Air & Introduction to Fluid Mechanics
Week 3	Mine Gases
Week 4	Subsurface Ventilation Systems
Week 5	Ventilation Surveys
Week 6	Natural Ventilation
Week 7	Fans
Week 8 Ventilation Network Analysis	
Week 9	Exam 1
Week 10	Ventilation Planning
Week 11	Coal Mine Ventilation Systems
Week 12	Methane & Radiation and Radon
Week 13	Psychrometry: The Study of Moisture in Air
Week 14	Physiological Reactions to Climatic Conditions
Week 15	The Hazardous Nature of Dusts
Week 16	
Week 17	Subsurface Fires and Explosions
Week 18	Exam 2
materials:
1.	Mine Ventilation and Air Conditioning, 3rd edition (1997), Hartman, H.L., et al., editors, John Wiley and Sons.
2.	ENGINEERING FACTORS IN THE VENTILATION OF METAL MINES. BY c. E. McELROY, UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE WASHINGTON .1935.
3.	COAL-MINE VENTILATION FACTORS BY H. P. GREENWALD and G. E. McELROY, UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE WASHINGTON .1929.
